channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0342; 07:13AM; 8900 N Winnetka Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/48v7vWn; #Winnetka; PRELIM: Three vehicle collision. Three patients total: One adult male is deceased and remains at scene. Two other adults (undetermined gender), have been taken to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in serious but stable condition. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes of travel in the vicinity of Winnetka Avenue near Nordhoff Street until LAPD / Medical Examiner operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts on Twitter/X ( https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts) for any service updates. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #898) and Medical Examiner. ; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 EM15 RA104 RA107 RA896; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0218; 05:13AM; 756 South Boyle Avenue; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vicZ8H; Boyle Heights; There were a total of five occupants in the home. Two patients were pulled out of the fire and transported in critical condition. A third patient was located outside the structure, on the porch, sadly beyond medical help and determined deceased on scene. The two occupants who were out of the home upon LAFD arrival are being evaluated for any possible injuries. Ages/genders unknown at this time. LAFD PIO Captain Adam VanGerpen is enroute for media availability. No further details.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E2 E201 E202 E203 E210 E287 E3 E4 E447 E458 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA4 RA803 SQ21 SQ87 T1 T10 T2 T3 T87 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0218; 04:49AM; 756 South Boyle Avenue; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vicZ8H; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 54 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no damage to the exposures. While conducting a search of the building, firefighters located a victim and pulled them out in critical condition. A thorough secondary search was clear with no other occupants located. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation per protocol. No further details. ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E2 E201 E202 E203 E210 E287 E3 E4 E447 E458 E9 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA4 RA803 SQ21 SQ87 T1 T10 T2 T3 T87 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0218; 04:24AM; 756 South Boyle Avenue; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vicZ8H; Boyle Heights; One story, single family dwelling fully involved in fire. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are in the defensive mode while defending the exposed buildings on two sides of the fire unit. ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E2 E202 E447 E458 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA4 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1259; 05:31PM; 19528 W Leadwell St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RCbcmj; Reseda; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to one room of one unit in a triplex (updated building type), preventing the fire from extending into the attic. No further details.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E273 E287 E290 E293 E73 RA100 RA73 T73 T87 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1259; 05:13PM; 19528 W Leadwell St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RCbcmj; Reseda; One story, single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E273 E287 E290 E293 E73 RA100 RA73 T73 T87 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#1417; 07:49PM; 12650 W Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aD7h16; Pacoima; A four car collision with five patients: 4 have minor, non-life threatening injuries and one was quickly extricated from the vehicle in critical condition (age/gender unknown). LAPD Inc# 3676 No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E275 E7 E98 EM14 HR3 RA75 RA898 RA91 T75 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Trapped Vehicle; INC#0541; 10:29AM; 11200 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48sVRLF; Palms; Incident updated to a single car collision and patient safely extricated. Firefighter/paramedics are assessing and will provide transport as required. LAPD Inc# 1491. No further details. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC4 E263 E43 E62 E69 EM11 HR3 RA59 RA62 T63 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0541; 10:11AM; 11200 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48sVRLF; Palms; Two car collision with one car overturned and one patient trapped. Firefighters are conducting an auto extrication operation. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC4 E263 E43 E62 E69 EM11 HR3 RA59 RA62 T63 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0925; 02:34PM; Hollywood Hills West; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tswn2f; Hollywood Hills; LAFD Air Ops located the injured hiker mid-slope on the hillside and lowered a rescuer for assessment. The adult, female patient suffered a ground level fall and sustained a possible ankle fracture. LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation followed by hospital transport. No further details.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
